item.title: BEAT CRUSADERS - HIT IN THE USA ("BECK"OP)

dreamed before

knock the door

Into the world

of perfect free

no lonely!)

get the chance

far from me

no lonely!)

item.title: BEAT CRUSADERS - TONIGHT, TONIGHT, TONIGHT ("BLEACH"OP)

Woke up with yawning

it’s dawning

I’m still alive

Turned on my radio

To start up new day

As goddxxxxx

How to survive

Tonight

Tonight

world wide
